amendatorysection.catchline: Sexual abuse of an inmate or parolee in the first degree; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: Any person who subjects an inmate or parolee to sexual penetration is guilty of sexual abuse of an inmate or parolee in the first degree. Sexual abuse of an inmate or parolee in the first degree is a Class IIA felony.

crossreference.para: Registration of sex offenders, see sections 29-4001 to 29-4014.

annotation.para: As used in this section, the word "subject" means to cause to undergo the action of something specified. State v. Loyuk, 289 Neb. 967, 857 N.W.2d 833 (2015).
